code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ListChacaras(){const[chacaras,setChacaras]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch('/mock-chacaras.json').then(response=>response.json()).then(data=>setChacaras(data));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"list-chacaras",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:" Ch\xE1caras Disponiveis"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"chacara-grid",children:chacaras.map(chacara=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"chacara-card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"imagem",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:chacara.image,alt:chacara.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:chacara.name})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:chacara.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:`/chacaras/${chacara.id}`,className:"btn",children:"Ver Detalhes"})]},chacara.id))})]});}export default ListChacaras;
